title: GPT-4o Launch
description: OpenAI launches GPT-4o ('o' for 'omni'), integrating text and images in a single model, marking a significant advancement in multimodal AI capabilities.

title: GPT-4o mini Release
description: OpenAI introduces GPT-4o mini, offering improved performance over GPT-3.5 Turbo at a lower cost, with a 128K context window and enhanced multilingual capabilities.

title: o1 and o1-mini Release
description: OpenAI releases o1 and o1-mini, new large language models trained with reinforcement learning to perform complex reasoning tasks.

title: Sora Video Generation Model
description: OpenAI introduces Sora, a video generation model that can create high-quality videos from text prompts.

title: 12 Days of OpenAI
description: OpenAI launches '12 Days of Shipmas', a daily announcement event featuring new AI features and tools, including the introduction of ChatGPT Pro and Sora video generation model.

title: o3 and o3-mini Preview
description: OpenAI previews o3 and o3-mini models, successors to the o1 series, claiming significant advancements in AI reasoning and interaction, with public launch expected in early 2025.

title: Model Context Protocol
description: Anthropic introduces a protocol focusing on advanced context usage for large language models, improving conversational depth and safety measures.

title: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
description: Anthropic showcases the poetic capacity of Claude 3.5 with a sonnet, reflecting the model's capability in structured creative expression.

title: Claude 3 Haiku
description: Anthropic unveils a sample haiku crafted by Claude 3, demonstrating the model’s succinct and elegant language generation abilities.

title: Meta Llama 3.1 Release
description: Meta unveils Llama 3.1, highlighting performance boosts and refined language understanding capabilities in this incremental update to the Llama series.

title: Llama 3.2 Release
description: Meta showcases Llama 3.2, emphasizing enhanced vision capabilities and optimized performance for edge and mobile applications.

title: What can an 8-year-old build with AI?
description: A 8-year-old girl, daughter of Ricky Robinette, builds a full-stack website with Cursor in 45 minutes.

title: Devin
description: Setting a new state of the art on the SWE-bench coding benchmark. Meet Devin, the world’s first fully autonomous AI software engineer.

title: Github Copilot Free in VSCode
description: Copilot Free gives you the choice between Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet or OpenAI's GPT-4o model.

title: Apple Intelligence
description: Apple's new AI system, Apple Intelligence, is announced at WWDC 2024.

title: GSA AI Framework
description: General Services Administration finalizes and issues framework for prioritizing critical emerging technologies, including generative AI capabilities, in a secure cloud environment.

title: EU AI Act Enters into Force
description: European Union enacts the AI Act (Regulation (EU) 2024/1689), the first-ever comprehensive legal framework on AI, addressing risks and setting requirements for AI developers and deployers.

title: OMB AI Acquisition Policy
description: Office of Management and Budget releases M-24-18, a government-wide policy to advance responsible acquisition of AI by Federal agencies.

title: NeurIPS 2024
description: Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems, featuring breakthrough research in machine learning and artificial intelligence.

title: Gemini 1.5
description: The model delivers dramatically enhanced performance, with a breakthrough in long-context understanding across modalities.

title: Gemini 2.0
description: Google's new AI model for the agentic era
